message:
Hi {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We have received a change request regarding your expected date of joining (DOJ) for the position of {{ doc.position }} at {{ doc.company }}.

Updated Expected DOJ Details:

  • Original Expected DOJ: {{ doc.original_doj }}
  • New Expected DOJ: {{ doc.new_doj }}

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this change, feel free to reach out to us.

We look forward to having you join our team at {{ doc.company }}!

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Expected DOJ Change
subject: Expected DOJ Change - Candidate Portal
